name: Matlab-lorentz-solver
tagline: Solve the Lorentz force with a temperature initialized number of particles.
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
Initial electric and magnetic field with the output saved in a HDF5 file and visualization saved in plots and movies for 2D and 3D.

### Designer Templates
Ready to use spatial varying electric and magnetic fields

### Creating pages manually
Analysis of drifts, with both Euler method and 4th order Runge-Kutta implemented

### Authors and Contributors
Author: Rogério Jorge

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
